Dracona walks over to Twister.

"Hello." Dracona said dryly...
  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 1:56 AM
  Subject: Re: The End Is Near........=
...........................................


  ~~~~~~~~~~Infectra/Twister~=
~~~~~~~~~
   
   
  *Infectra frowns and puts her arms around Airbomber. Me=
ch tears weld up in Infectra's optics*



  *Twister sits at the same table=
 and just sits there and than her head rises with her optics not blinking a=
 bit*

  Twister:.......alone........

  *Twister whispers to herself*
    =
----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
    Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 1:31 AM
    Subject: The End Is Near..=
.................................................


    Plintissa and Artis=
t look at each other sadly. Why would Dracona do this? She couldn't be repr=
ogrammed, she had a device that could prevent it. Plintissa knew that her o=
nly friend was against her.

    "Artist, we have to go back and try to con=
vince Dracona." Plintissa said.

    "I agree, we must face danger, and not=
 flee. Oops." Artist said. Plintissa snickered.

    "It's okay, Artist, if=
 you have to rhyme, then rhyme." Plintissa said. Artist smiled and both of =
them returned to Team Ultima's base.

    Dracona looked to Train Wreck.

 =
   "YOU! What are you doing?" Dracona yelled. Train Wreck smiled.

    "Ste=
aling your equipment, what does it look like?" Train Wreck said. Dracona gr=
owled.

    "I thought I reprogrammed you!" Dracona said.

    "Yeah? I use=
d your own invention against you! And I used it on my friends, too!" Train =
Wreck said. Arrow stepped up by Train Wreck. They both looked at Blender an=
d Stronghold. B;ender walks up. Stronghold does. Stronghold reaches out and=
 grabs Train Wreck, forcing him down and sticking a rifle to the back of hi=
s head. Blender grabs Arrow and drags him down as well.

    "Sorry old fri=
ends, but Dracona's deal is a BETTER deal!" Blender said.

    "Outside, I =
don't want any blood in the base."  Dracona said. Train Wreck and Arrow wer=
e drug outside. Train Wreck suddenly lurched out and hit Blender. Stronghol=
d was hit by Arrow, who had escaped. Stronghold and Blender chased Arrow an=
d Train Wreck into the jungle. Stronghold struggles with Train Wreck. Arrow=
 is hit so hard by Blender he is put into stasis lock. Train Wreck is beat =
senseless by both of S.A.B. Inc. (Stronghold and Blender Incompany.) Train =
Wreck tries all of his submissions but Stronghold and Blender always save e=
ach other. Train Wreck is held in the air by Stronghold. Blender laughs. Tr=
ain Wreck is almost dead, his mech fluid is flooding the jungle and is almo=
st drowning Arrow. Blender pops a spinning saw blade from his forearm and s=
lams it through Train Wreck. Stronghold drops Train Wreck and laughs. Blend=
er reaches down and snaps Train Wreck's neck. Blender and Stronghold bow to=
 each other and turn to Arrow. Arrow wakes up for a few seconds and looks a=
t them.

    "Wha?" Arrow asks. Stronghold reaches out and looks into a hol=
e. He sweeps all of Train Wreck's mech fluid into it.

    "Sayonara ass!" =
Blender said. Stronghold jumps into the pit of mech fluid and sticks Arrow'=
s head under. Arrow finally stops struggling. Stronghold drops Arrow and Bl=
ender kicks him. They both laugh and walk back towards Team Ultima base. Th=
ey both take out cigars and smoke them in satisfaction of their acompishmen=
ts.

    Stranato suddenly grabs his chest in pain. Airbomber stares at him=
. Stranato suddenly starts changing form. Stranato now looks a little diffe=
rent. Airbomber screams and is also slightly morphed.

    "What does this =
mean?" Airbomber asked Stranato.

    "It means that...Train Wreck and Arro=
w are dead. I can feel it." Stranato said.

    "What? How?" Airbomber said=
 desperatley.

    "It appears our plan didn't work out." Stranato said.

 =
   "Plan?" Airbomber replies.

    "Yes, none of the Radiocns were reprogra=
mmed really." Stranato replied sadly.

    "Then why are Train Wreck and Ar=
row dead?" Airbomber asked.

    "They were killed...by Stronghold and Blen=
der." Stranato replied sadly.

    "WHAT! Our friends killed out friends!?!=
?!?!?" Airbomber said.

    "Sadly, yes, they betrayed us, but out friends,=
 now live on in us." Stranato said.

    "Huh?" Airbomber questioned.

    =
"Their sparks joined in with ours, we now posses their power, the Radicons =
are no more, let us say goodbye to our good friends as their spiritual spar=
ks head toward the Matrix. Airbomber and Stranato stood in silence, salutin=
g Arrow and Train Wreck. Airbomber puts his arm around Infectra and cries. =
Stranato also cannot keep character, and is crying as well.

    Gangon sta=
rts to fade away, realizing he isn't wanted anymore.
     
    Lightmare's =
spark floats slowly toward the Matrix, unsure if she wants to go there. Arr=
ow and Train Wreck's sparks come by. Lightmare's spark notices them. The fo=
rmer Radicons floated into the Matrix. Lightmare's spark lit up and followe=
d them.

    Deemos and Inzoola sit there VERY bored. They couldn't believe=
 that nobody was paying attention to them!

    "I don't believe this, how =
can they treat me like this!?" Deemos yelled.

    "If your bored, we could=
 always go find a spot and...be alone." Inzola said. Deemos just stared col=
dly. Inzola frowned, she knew Deemos felt unimportant, but right now he was=
 making her feel pretty unimportant, too!

    Sinesis is still healing up =
in the CR Chamber of Team Ultima base.

    Dracona calls Zardus on her com=
m unit.

    "Zardus, this is former Alliance warrior Dracona, I wish to ma=
ke...an Alliance with the Alliance." She said.

    Plintissa noticed Stron=
ghold and Blender, she and Artist slowly sneaking up behind them.

    Sini=
ster is "Alone" with Blizzard...
